name: Florida Water Aftershave
description:
Florida Water 7.5 FL OZ
Refreshing and leaves the skin fragrant.
Faint and elusive, yet delightful scent.
Gives a delightful glow to the skin.

Since 1808, Lanman & Kemp, Barclay & Co. has been famous the world over for Florida Water Cologne. Before Shaving, Murray & Lanman's Florida Water softens the toughest beard and prepares the skin for a smooth, luxurious shave. After Shaving, it contracts the pores, Its mildly astringent action soothes and heals skin abrasions caused by shaving.

SD Alcohol 39 , Water , Fragrances , FD&C Blue Color #1 , FD&C Yellow Color #5

Florida water 7.5 FL OZ is a refreshing and stimulating floral and citrus scented cologne often used for ritual offering and purification

name: Bonafide Pomade
description:
Bona Fide Pomade is a water-based hair pomade for men and women. With a light-fresh citrus scent, strong-durable hold, and high shine, our pomade is designed to keep your hairs in order in any and all situations! Bona Fide Pomade grips your hair like traditional petrolatum based hair products but washes out with ease! But wait there is more, Bona Fide Pomade does not harden like other competing brands in the market so say good bye to helmet hair! So if you want class, style, and affordability in a hair product, choose Bona Fide Pomade!!!
		
	
Ingredients
Water (Aqua), Ceteareth-25, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Glycerin, Polysorbate-20, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Diazolidinyl Urea, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, DMDM Hydantoin, Orange 4

name: Suavecito Bay Rum After Bath
description:
Just a good old fashioned bay rum to wake you up in the morning after a fine shave.  Suavecito makes you feel like you're sitting in the barber's chair with this aftershave which both refreshes and soothes.

Size: 4oz
SHIPPING RESTRICTIONS: This product contains alcohol, which is potentially hazardous for shipping. We can not ship it outside of the continental USA. If you are an international customer, this item will be refunded and will not be shipped. If you are a customer in the continental USA, your order will ship via ground regardless of the delivery option selected. Please select FedEx Home or FedEx Ground during checkout.

name: Suavecito Pre-Shave
description:
Made with 100% natural essential oils and plant ingredients, this genius oil-based blend allows for an ultra-glide shaving experience unlike any other product. Together with Vitamin E Oil, Aloe Vera Oil and Jojoba Oil, this combination offers remarkable protection against the harshness of a blade.

Make this part of your pre-shave ritual and marvel at the effects. End razor burn, bumps and reddening. This 1 oz. bottle goes a surprisingly long way!

Simply use the dropper included and rub a few drops into palms of hands then immediately to the area to be shaved. This product may be used alone or as a base in conjunction with Suavecito Shaving Creme for a rich lather. Follow up post-shave with Suavecito Bay Rum After Bath (for an incredible bite) or Suavecito Menthol Vanishing Creme (for soothing mint).

Get it.

name: Suavecito Menthol Vanishing Creme
description:
Sooth and nourish your face at a rock price surprising price.  As with all Suavecito products, this aftershave and moisturizing cream is made to just work.  Menthol and mint make for a great refreshing sensation.

Size: 8 oz

name: Anchors Hair Co. Three Pack - One of Each
description: Combo Pack Features all three variations of the Anchors Hair Co. product line.

name: Wolf Call Hair Grease
description:
This medium hold formula with bay rum scent will bring out the beast in you. Awaaaooooo!
Don't let other pomades and waxes disappoint you when you can roll with the WOLF CALL!

hand made all natural hair grease. contains beeswax, natural and scented oils.
approx: 4 oz. (amount per can is comparable to murays wax)

name: Uppercut Matte Clay
description:
A heavy weight, matte pomade with a fresh peppermint scent
 
 
The latest pomade from Australia for a firm hold and matt beach look. With a nice, warm peppermint scent. 

 

If you don't want glossy hair and are ready to pay a bit more the Uppercut Matt Clay is the right choice for you. The "Uppercut Matt Clay Pomade" is a modern classic pomade on petrolatum base. It was formulated and tested by barbers and is suitable for all hair types and hairstyles. The tin can with a very nice sporty design is an eye catcher anyway.

 

Consistency and fragrance
The Uppercut Matt Clay is a field-gray pomade with a warm undertone. It has a heavy weight consistency. Once you have managed to dig a little pomade, the pomade and feels like soft plastic on your finger. But it is not as sticky as a DAX or Murray's, but more dry. The pomade can be rubbed quite well rub between your hands and worked into the hair. Surprisingly enough already a little pomade achieves a very nice effect. The scent is one of the freshest: a really pleasant peppermint scent with a touch of vanilla. And in fact the Uppercut Matt Clay contains real peppermint oil. As in the 1930's mineral oil and lanolin keeps hair and scalp in a good condition. Only a bit chemistry might spoil this gray pomade. But this price of modernity will surely please fans of the dry hair look..

 

The effect
With Uppercut Matt Clay your hair will get dull as mud - not a hint of shine. This effect ensures the contained clay (kaolin). The Uppercut Matt Clay is suitable for all firm classical and messy modern hair styles. The hold is firm, and if you already have a soft pomade or a hair tonic in your hair the Uppercut Matt Clay ads a very nice hold to your hair.
The Uppercut Matt Clay is quite easy to wash out. But you will get a nice effect when you leavy the pomade in your hair over night: on the next morning the hair looks thicker and all you need is just combing through a bit or fresh it up with a hair tonic, like the Jeris or Lucky Tiger Hair Tonic.

Application: Apply pomade with dry hands into dry hair. Then comb or shape with his hands. To wash out use a shampoo.

name: Bang Bang Gun Comb
description:
Description: 
A fashion tool used to arm yourself with style.
Overview: 
Plastic.
4.5" x 10" x 0.5".

name: Anchors Hair Co. Teddy Boy Classic Pomade
description:
Classic Pomade – Oil-based pomade that offers amazing shine, hold and health. Mint/Tea Tree for a pH balanced scalp – Teddy Boy
$10
What is it?!
Teddy Boy Classic Pomade is an oil-based pomade enriched with essential oils for maintaining a clean scalp, promoting hair strength and locking in moisture. Teddy Boy Classic Pomade is SO easy to use. Just towel dry, apply, comb in and look awesome! It’s great for that slick Mad Men barbering look or to simply lay down fly-a-ways.
Who is it for?!
All types of hair. Best for user’s that want to achieve a high sheen look or subtle pieceyness.
Features!
*Tons of shine and great hold.
*Great minty scent that lasts through out the day.
*Very soft yet thick and easy to comb through hair.
*Tons of nourishing ingredients that pack health, moisture and strength into your hair and scalp.
**With every purchase, a bar of organic soap is sent to a family living in a poverty stricken environment.
<strongKey Ingredients:
Coconut Oil – Moisture
Tea Tree Oil – Balances scalp / promotes growth
Olive Oil – Strength
Bees Wax – Hold
-Paraben Free
-Alcohol Free

name: Anchors Hair Co. Sirens & Sailors Matte Wax
description:
Non-Greasy Dry Matte Wax – Water-based hair wax that offers a strong hold and a true dry matte finish! – Sirens & Sailors
$12
What is it?!
Sirens & Sailors is a thicker mold-able handmade hair wax that’s great for men and women. It’s soft, yet thick and provides a great matte hold. Awesome for volume, texture and encouraging hair growth and strength..
This water-based formula has been tested and proved to hold its own against all other corporate ran manufactured brands..
Who is it for?!
All hair types wanting to achieve a firm hold and a natural non-greasy finish.
Features!
*A thick water-based pomade. Great for a true matte finish.
*Goes on soft and easy to work through hair. Easy to style, mold and restyle.
*Infused with Bamboo extract & Vitamin E for stronger, fuller hair.
*Formulated with non-greasy organic oils for a shine-less hold.
**With every purchase, a bar of organic soap is sent to a family living in a poverty stricken environment.
Key Ingredients
Carnauba Wax/Micro Wax – great hold, easy to wash out
Grapeseed Oil - Non-greasy, softens and promotes growth
Vitamin E – preserve, hair growth
Bamboo Extract- fullness, body
-Paraben Free
-Petroleum Free
-Alcohol Free
**Blended with Anchor’s Poly-Lock Technology –  A calibrated mixture of natural waxes and carrier oils, fused with PVP/VA Copolymers that brings a flexible hold, straight to the core of your hair. Not to mention, it’s water soluble.. So washing the junk out of your hair is hassle-free!

name: Anchors Hair Co. Hair Shaper
description:
Shape Maker is the original Anchors product. A handmade cream like pomade that produces a brilliant mid-shine and flexible lasting hold. , Shape Maker makes shapes like no other!
This water-based formula has been tested and proved to hold its own against all other corporate ran manufactured brands..
Anchors Hair Products weren’t produced by a chemist that knows chemicals, they were produced by a hair stylist that knows hair.
Key Ingredients
Carnauba Wax – great hold, formable, easy to wash out
Coconut Oil – shine, softening, moisture
Vitamin E – preserve, hair growth
Bamboo Extract – strength/body
-Paraben Free
-Petroleum Free
**With every purchase, a bar of organic soap is sent to a family living in a poverty stricken environment.
Shape Maker Pomade is blended with Anchor’s Poly-Lock Technology – A calibrated mixture of natural waxes and carrier oils, fused with PVP/VA Copolymers that brings a flexible hold, straight to the core of your hair. Not to mention, it’s water soluble.. So washing the junk out of your hair is hassle-free!

name: High Life Heavy
description:
High Life Heavy Pomade is one of the heaviest Pomade currently on the market and holds like no other but, with easy maintenance and manageability. Perfect for shaping and sculpting thick curly hair to give give you a super-strong hold for pomp’s, flattops, and short quiffs. AND NO IT DOES NOT WASH OUT! WHY... YOU ASK? BECAUSE IT'S NOT SUPPOSED TO! It is intended to remain in the hair for consistent control. All High Life Pomades contain Emu oil to help strengthen and rejuvenate the hair and eliminate greasy feel. A REAL GENTLEMAN’S HAIR DRESSING! 3.5oz
Scent- Coconut

Usage Instructions:
Place desired amount of High Life (Heavy) between palms and apply to clean, damp or dry hair. Use fingertips to spike, sculpt and create stiff definition.
Ingredients:
White Microwax, Petrolatum, Emu Oil, Jojoba Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Avocado Oil, Fragrance.

name: High life Medium
description:
High Life Medium Pomade that is perfect for shaping and sculpting all hair types. Provides strong hold for pomp’s and flattops. Best part, it does not wash out! Contains Emu oil to help strengthen and rejuvenate the hair and eliminate greasy feel.. A REAL gentleman’s, hair dressing. 3.5oz
Scent- Coconut

Usage Instructions:
Place desired amount of High Life (Medium) between palms and apply to clean, damp or dry hair. Use fingertips to spike, sculpt and create stiff definition.
Ingredients:
White Microwax, Petrolatum, Emu Oil, Jojoba Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Avocado Oil, Fragrance.

name: High Life Light

High Life Light Pomade is perfect for shaping and sculpting thinner hair types. Provides light hold with tons of sheen for slick-back do’s. Best part, it does not wash out! Contains Emu oil to help strengthen and rejuvenate the hair and eliminate greasy feel.. A REAL gentleman’s, hair dressing. 3.5oz
Scent- Coconut

Usage Instructions:

Ingredients:
White Microwax, Petrolatum, Emu Oil, Jojoba Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Avocado Oil, Fragrance.

name: Bees Knees High Sheen Pomade
description:
It is perfect if you're looking for a pliable strong hold with a wet look throughout the day. 

Bees Knees High Sheen will also help to rejuvenate your scalp. It contains Sweet Orange Oil, Clove Oil, and Sandalwood Oil to bring out the natural shine in your hair.

Great for people who are used to a strong hold in their pomade and want a high sheen from their pomade, but also value in their scalp and don't want the petroleum.

name: Bees Knees Light Pomade
description:
ame great smell and benefits as the Original formula, just much a much lighter hold. This stuff spreads easily and looks great for doing side-parts, slick-backs, and many other vintage styles. 

Bees Knees Lite will also help to rejuvenate your scalp. It contains Tea Tree Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, and Peppermint Oil, to help control dandruff while opening your pores and stimulating blood flow to your scalp.

Great for people who are used to a light hold in their pomade, but also value in their scalp and don't want the petroleum.

name: Bees Knees Original Pomade
description:
This is the stuff we started with. It is perfect if you're looking for a pliable strong hold. 

Bees Knees Original will also help to rejuvenate your scalp. It contains Tea Tree Oil, Eucalyptus Oil, and Peppermint Oil, to help control dandruff while opening your pores and stimulating blood flow to your scalp.

Great for people who are used to a strong hold in their pomade, but also value in their scalp and don't want the petroleum.

name: Uppercut Deluxe 3-Piece Essentials Kit
description:
Stand Strong and Stay Sharp with Uppercut Deluxe. The 3-Piece Essentials Kit will keep you looking slick on a day to day basis, it contains featherweight pomade, shaving cream and aftershave moisturizer.

Label: Uppercut Deluxe

Combo Pack of 3 Uppercut Products
Uppercut Featherweight Pomade 70g

name: Suavecito - Firme Pomade
description:
Quick Overview
Grips your hair like wax, but is water soluble
Perfect on classic, modern, retro and old-school styles
Strong hold that lasts all day
Lasts longer and holds tighter!
4 oz jar

Our NEW generation of water-based pomade. All the same great features of our original Suavecito Pomade but with a deadlier grip! Lasts longer and holds tighter! People have been begging for it and now it is finally here!

Specially formulated for those harder-to-hold styles.

Your hair will thank you.

This Pomade grips your hair like wax, but is water soluble. Washes out just like a hair gel (the best of both worlds!) The product contains a unique scent that has proven to be extremely admirable by males and females alike! It smells very clean. Works perfect on classic, modern, retro and old-school styles with a strong hold that lasts all day.

Add a little bit of water during application for a hair-style that has that “wet” look. You will be pleased when you discover how effortlessly this product washes out in the shower!

name: Suavecito - Original Pomade
description:
This Pomade grips your hair like wax, but is water soluble. Washes out just like a hair gel (the best of both worlds!) The product contains a unique scent that has proven to be extremely admirable by males and females alike! It smells very clean. Works perfect on classic, modern, retro and old-school styles with a strong hold that lasts all day.

4oz

name: Imperial Dax Hair Comb
description:
Black Comb
Made by Imperial Dax
5.25 inches
Unbreakable plastic hair comb
The Imperial Dax Hair Comb is the perfect on-the-go accessory. It has fine width teeth that are great for styling or re-styling hair throughout the day. The unbreakable plastic comb is durable and will be great for your gym bag or glove compartment. 

Length: 5.25 inches

name: Murray's Pomade - Super Light
description:
Murrays Super Light 
Introduced as a softer, lighter alternative
85 gram / 3 OZ

name: Uppercut Deluxe Waterbased Pomade
description:
A medium weight, water soluble pomade for fine hair
It is candy-brown, ideal for a pompadour or a business look and pricy. With a pleasant caramel fragrance. Made in Australia.

The "Uppercut Deluxe is a modern, water-based pomade. It was developed by barbers and is suitable for all hair types and hairstyles. The design of the can is really a looker, and is not just for boxing fans an enrichment for the bathroom. The fragrance is very subtle in the hair and leaves the environment asking what winning fragrance this is.

 

Consistency and fragrance
The Uppercut Deluxe is glassy brown, looks like a melted caramel candy. And it also smells even like a caramel candy. But not too sweet or intrusive, but rather fresh like sweet vanilla with a hint of coconut aroma. On fingers it feels soft, not sticky and can be washed off from hands without any problems.

 

The effect
The Uppercut Deluxe offers a good medium-firm hold with a little gloss. It is therefore a good for a businessman hairstyle or a small pompadour. As the Layrite pomade pomade it does not dry out in your hair any can be combed over at any time. To washi it out all you need is just warm water and your hair is dry as straw again. It owes this easiness to modern chemistry, but at least the contained glycerin provides some little hair care.

name: Lucky 13 White Lightning Deluxe Light Pomade - 2 oz
description:
Quick Overview
• Created by Murray's, a world famous hair products line
• Light pomade for high shine non stiff look
• Pleasant, light fruit scent
2 oz

Details

Lucky 13 White Lightning is a light pomade actually created by Murray's, a world famous hair products line. This is a petrolatum based styling aid so you're sure it will keep your hair neat and groomed all day with a light, non stiff look. Offers high shine too! Pleasant, light fruit scent.

name: High Life VooDoo Brew
description: High Life Voodoo Brew provides heavy hold for most all hair types. It is tinted a darker tone to maximize naturally darker hair tones and to avoid the appearance of flakes. Easy molding ability for maximum sculpting and shaping performance. Voodoo Brew is perfect for pompadours, jelly rolls, or just that classic look you desire! Mild coconut scent. Just like the rest of the High Life products, it does not wash out.! 3.5oz

name: High Life VooDoo Brew II
description:
High Life Voodoo Brew II provides a smooth, shiny hold to flawlessly style your pompadour, jelly roll or the classic look that you love. Voodoo Brew II is perfect for all hair types providing a heavy hold, but also has easy molding for shaping and sculpting your hair. Just like all of the High Life products, it does not wash out. 3.5oz
Scent- Vanilla

Usage Instructions:
Place desired amount of High Life (Voo Doo Brew II) between palms and apply to clean, damp or dry hair. Use fingertips to spike, sculpt and create stiff definition.
Ingredients:
White Microwax, Petrolatum, Emu Oil, Jojoba Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Avocado Oil, Fragrance, color.

name: Dax Short & Neat
description: Dax Short and Neat Light Hair Dress is the perfect light hair dress for the short, natural look. Offers a medium hold and is great for all hair types. Best if used on short to medium length hair.

name: Dax Hair Shaper
description: Dax Hair Shaper Hair Dress is a versatile hair cream that has the ability to create the most exceptional styles. This product provides a medium hold and can be used to scrunch, mold, slick and style hair. Best if used on short to medium length hair. Directions: Placed desired amount of Dax Hair Shaper into hands and rub between palms until even. Apply to clean, damp or dry hair for shaping, sculpting, and separating. Use fingertips to create volume at roots and style hair as desired.

name: Dax Green & Gold
description:
Dax Green & Gold is a specially formulated wax that is made from Beeswax and natural oils. Green & Gold offers a superior hold without the unwanted build up or drying of the hair.

Directions

Use a small amount on dried and styled hair. Lightly cover fingertips. Rub into palms and apply to desired area. Shape with fingers. Add more Green & Gold if desired.

Ingredients

Petrolatum, Lanolin, Beeswax, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sesame Seed Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Safflower Oil, Peanut Oil, Cottonseed Oil, D&C Yellow 11, Parfum.

name: Dax Hair Wax
description:
Dax Wax Washable Hair Wax washes out easily in one wash. It works great on short hair and is an ideal styling product for everyday use.

Sculpting
Creating stiff definition

The special formula holds in style then washes out fast and easily under water. DirectionsHair should be clean and wet or moist for best application. Take small amount and rub between palms until even and apply to hair. Style as normal and necessary.

9" long (when open), metal and plastic

description:
TEXTURE WITH SHINE, WORKABLE, WATER SOLUBLE

A modern pomade for great hold and unlimited flexibility. Water based for easy removal-no shampoo needed. Like a traditional pomade with tons of shine except its water soluble.

4 oz

Apply to wet or dry hair and style as usual.

name: Mitch - Barber's Classic
description:
Moderate Hold / High Shine
Works through hair quickly with comb or fingers
Great for classic styles & slicked back looks

name: American Crew - Pomade
description:
POMADE

Medium hold with high shine.
Extremely versatile water-based formula rinses clean and offers smooth control with shine. Works well for curly hair and provides a modern, flexible alternative to styling gels.

Application: Work a small amount evenly through damp or dry hair and style as desired.

Features: Water Based, Lanolin, Complex Strong Hold.

Benefits: Shampoos out easily without residue. Provides tremendous shine and pliable hold. Ultimate hold in a pliable product.

3 oz.

name: American Crew - Fiber
description:
Pliable fiber w/ high hold and low shine 
FIBER

High hold with low shine.
Fiber-like, resinous product helps thicken, texturize and increase fullness to hair. Provides a strong, pliable hold with a matte finish. Works well in shorter hair, 1-3 inches in length.

Application: For best results, rub a small amount evenly between palms before working into hair. Distribute evenly through damp or dry hair and style as desired.

Features: Lanolin, Cetyl Palmitate, Ceteareth-20, Beeswax.

Benefits: Humectant and emollient responsible for unsurpassed hold, an emollient that provides a smooth after feel, a fine conditioner and an excellent emulsifier, protects against moisture loss while providing total control.

3 oz.

name: Murray's Pomade - Beeswax
description:
Price: 3.5 oz. jar
Murray's Beeswax is easy to apply yet stiff enough for the most demanding hair styles. A must for braids dreadlocks and other hard to hold styles. Murray's imports the highest available grade of Beeswax from Australia.

name: Murray's Pomade - Original Pomade
description:
Price: 3 oz. can
The original since 1926. Murray's is one of the world's leading hair pomades. Stylists worldwide praise Murray's versatility and ability to create any style. Adds texture, shine and lift while holding the hair in place all day. Perfect for all types of people with all types of hair.

name: Uppercut Pomade - Deluxe Pomade
description:
Uppercut Deluxe Pomade is a water-soluble product suitable for a diverse range of styles but particularly popular with fellas rocking a slickback, quiff or mohawk. Its unique formula means it will wash out easily leaving no residue. The Pomade gives control and definition without the weight of traditional pomades.

Directions for use: Rub a small amount into palms and work through dry hair to style as desired.

Size: 100ml.

name: Uppercut Pomade - Featherweight
description:
Don’t be fooled by the name, just because this wax is light doesn’t mean it can’t pack a punch. Featherweight has plenty of tack and dry finish for a natural looking hold. Great for messy quiffs and textured styles. Another great feature with this product is that it’s water soluble which means you get a great dry look without any build up or residue. Without a doubt the great all rounder.

Size: 70g.

name: Uppercut Pomade - Monster Hold
description: For those who like it real strong we present to you our Monster Hold pomade. Extra powerful, sweat resistant and great for all styles.

name: American Pomade - Original Sin
description:
The classic American Pomade, medium weight, good hold, nice shine, mild
scent and all kinds of cool.

American Pomade® was started (in 2010) because we couldn’t find what we were looking for.

There are some great pomades on the market … but we found them either too slick or too stiff.

Also, we wanted a product free of colors, perfumes and chemicals.

We wanted something traditional, definitely not water based ...

We wanted real grease, real pomade ...

So we broke it down ...

We experimented and came up with something simple and cool.

American Pomade is made with minimal ingredients:

Petroleum jelly & beeswax … some coconut oil and a couple drops 
of essential oil for a clean, mild scent.

It's hair grease, man ... if you want to smell like perfume or flowers ...

Borrow something from your girlfriend.

Our beeswax comes from Northern California farmers.

No colors, no perfume, no chemicals … no freaky shit.

name: American Pomade - Ultimate Sin
description:
Our heavy weight pomade, super hold, same mild scent and all kinds of cool.

PETROLEUM BASED

American Pomade® was started (in 2010) because we couldn’t find what we were looking for.

There are some great pomades on the market … but we found them either too slick or too stiff.

Also, we wanted a product free of colors, perfumes and chemicals.

We wanted something traditional, definitely not water based ...

We wanted real grease, real pomade ...

So we broke it down ... 

We experimented and came up with something simple and cool.

American Pomade is made with minimal ingredients:

Petroleum jelly & beeswax … some coconut oil and a couple drops
of essential oil for a clean, mild scent.

It's hair grease, man ... if you want to smell like perfume or flowers ...

Borrow something from your girlfriend.

Our beeswax comes from Northern California farmers.

No colors, no perfume, no chemicals … no freaky shit.

name: Grant's Golden Brand Original Tin of Pomade
description:
Whether you’re going for a slicked-back ‘50s greaser look or a dapper, buttoned-up side part, this superior water-based pomade will get the job done. It delivers a strong hold, a resplendent glossy finish, and a subtle almond scent. Like both of those classic styles, this pomade was made right here in the USA.

The water-based formula goes into hair smoothly and washes out in the shower. This formula is also a breeze to restyle throughout the day. Unlike gels that dry and harden, it allows you restyle easily with a slightly wet comb.

Scoop out a small amount of pomade using two fingers. Warm it up in your hands, and run the product through clean and dry hair. Use a comb to style.

name: Lucky-13 Devil's Deluxe Medium Weight Pomade
description:
Lucky-13 Barber Supplies DEVIL'S DELUXE medium pomade for medium hold and shine. By Murray's

Made In The U.S.A.

name: Lucky-13 Tru-Hold Heavyweight Pomade
description:
Lucky-13 Barber Supplies TRU-HOLD heavy pomade for strong hold. By Murray's

Made In The U.S.A.

name: Layrite Original Pomade
description:
Layrite holds like a wax, yet washes out like a jel.
The pomade washes out quickly with just water.
For real men serious about their hair this super rich and waxy hair dressing works great with both fine and extremely thick hair
Create high pomps, slicked backs, parts, businessmen's cuts, DAs, flat-tops, spikes, and extreme styles such as mohawks
This pomade was developed for traditional, classic, and retro styles
Whatever your hairstyle may be, it will Layrite! Clean vanilla scent! A little goes a long way.

name: Layrite Super Hold Pomade
description:
Developed to replace the wax that greasers would use in the SoCal rockabilly scene, water-based Layrite pomade holds like a wax, but washes out like a gel! What other pomades call mega-extreme hold, we just call super. The same formula greasers have been trusting for 10 years.

Holds as strong as a wax
High shine for that polished look
Water-based formula washes right out just like a gel
No drying formula keeps hair soft with no flaking
Controls even the curliest and thickest hair out there
Keeps your hair in place and looking good all day
HOW TO USE LAYRITE POMADE:
Because it is water-based, Layrite pomade is versatile - you control the strength of hold and sheen simply by drying your hair to the desired amount.

Step 1: Dry your hair.  Layrite Pomade is has the strongest hold when used on DRY HAIR. Blow your hair completely dry for hold like a 90 weight wax or towel dry your hair for hold like a 30 weight wax.  

Step 2.  Apply Layrite to your hair.  Rub an ample of Layrite into the palms of your hands until it softens, then rub thoroughly into your hair.

Step 3. Style your hair.  Simply comb or brush into desired hairstyle.  Add more Layrite or more water as needed to achieve the style you want. Layrite does not dry in your hair so you can re-style as need throughout the day without losing any control.

name: Clubman Gel - Super Hold
description:
Keeps hair neat, well groomed...
Never greasy. Conditions as it grooms...
Contains no alcohol, gum or wax...
Clean smell.

16oz.

name: Shiner Gold Pomade
description:
Shiner Gold Pomade: It's your "Time to Shine"

Shiner Gold is a heavy holding Pomade that goes in thick but won't rip your hair out. It works for all types of hair but was designed for thick and wavy-haired people in mind. Shiner Gold sets up hard but keeps it's comb- ability with a greasy feel.

Shiner Gold has a coconut scent with a nice shine and detail to tradition. 
You will not be disappointed with this great Pomade.
 
4oz [112 g] aluminum screw top container. Made in USA.
 
Ingredients:
Water , Ceteareth 25, PEG-7 Glyceryl, Propylene Glycol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-8 Beeswax.

name: Shiner Gold Giant Tub of Pomade - 32oz
description:
Shiner Gold Pomade: It's your "Time to Shine"

Shiner Gold is a heavy holding Pomade that goes in thick but won't rip your hair out. It works for all types of hair but was designed for thick and wavy-haired people in mind. Shiner Gold sets up hard but keeps it's comb- ability with a greasy feel.

Shiner Gold has a coconut scent with a nice shine and detail to tradition. 
You will not be disappointed with this great Pomade. 

32oz plastic huge ginormous screw top container. Made in USA.

Water , Ceteareth 25, PEG-7 Glyceryl, Propylene Glycol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-8 Beeswax.

name: Imperial Pomade
description:
For slicked-back styles, pumped-up pomps or Cub Scout side parts, the Classic Pomade is an absolute staple. Sure, it’s America’s strongest-holding water-based pomade, but that doesn’t mean you won’t have absolute control of your ‘do. Apply liberally to dry hair for full-strength hold, or just dab it on a damp head for a lighter look. You have the power.

For most hair types. Rinses clean and/or re-styles easily with water. Semi-sheen. Hold strength: 4 (out of 4).

name: Clubman Supreme Hair Spray Pump
description:
Non-aerosol styling and grooming spray
Extra hold
Fast drying
Conditions with Panthenol
8oz

name: Clubman Shave Cream
description:
The formula is enriched with Aloe Vera for a smooth shave.
Benefits: Protects and lubricates whiskers with its rich, creamy lather.

12oz

name: Clubman Talc 9oz
description: Nothing finishes off a haircut or shave like Clubman Talc. It has a clean, fresh scent favored since 1810. Bob Hope and Kirk Douglas are just a few of those who have been “in the club.” Formulated for maximum moisture and oil absorption, it keeps your face and neck fresh and dry, helps hide nicks and blemishes, doubles as a deodorizing foot powder. 9-oz. container. White powder. Made in USA.

name: Clubman Aftershave Lotion
description: Clubman after shave lotion is the quintessential after shave. This after shave lotion fragrance burst with top notes of orange, bergamot and mouth-watering lemon with green nuances throughout. The floral heart of jasmine, orange flower and geranium dance with lavender and is completed with a warm musk background.

name: Clubman Virgin Island Bay Rum
description:
As refreshing as an island breeze.

A classic all-purpose fragrance.
Formulated with a unique blend of essence of bay tree and exotic spices.
Instantly cools, tones and refreshes the skin. Splash freely all over your body.
Made in USA
6oz.

name: Lucky-13 Junior's Ringing Gel / Pomade
description:
Waterbased Junior's ringing gel/pomade, formulated by Murray's for Lucky 13! Use for light hold or to add to other wax pomades for a shine that's fine!

Made In The U.S.A.

name: Lucky-13 Royal Flush Shampoo
description: Lucky-13 Barber Supplies ROYAL FLUSH soy based shampoo designed specifically to help wash out various pomades. By Murray's. NOTE: APPLY THIS PRODUCT ON YOUR HAIR DRY FIRST, LATHER THEN WASH OUT!!! WORKS BEST WHEN APPLIED BEFORE WETTING HAIR. SOY BASED

name: Cock Grease "XXX" (Water-Based)
description:
Finally, a water-based pomade with a firm hold that can be re-combed.

This is NOT a gel pomade.

For the stiffest hold apply to dry hair.

name: Steadfast Pomade
description:
Steadfast Pomade has a medium plus hold, nice shine & gives you the ability to mold your hair in your desired style. The crystal blue pomade features a clean rugged scent and can easily be washed out.
4 oz.

name: Three Flowers - Molding Pomade
description:
Water Based so No Greasy Feel
Classic Tres Flores Fragrance
Flexible Styling Pomade
Spike it, shape it, mold it whenever the mood strikes without that greasy feel
Brilliantine shine formula: all of the shine in a water based pomade
6oz.

name: Grant's Golden Brand Matte Dressing Pomade
description:
The Premiere Mid-Weight Molding Compound
Combines the Texture and Effects of Wax, Paste & Cream
Completely Matte (no shine)
Superb Pliability & Holding, Lasting Power
Provides Convertible "Best of Both Worlds" style: Polished or Messy
Maximizes Density & Won't Overwhelm Fine Hair
Great for All Hair Types, Beneficial for Short Hair
Can be Used on Dry or Slightly Damp Hair
Separates Piecey Styles; Holds Firm for Demanding Styles
Clean, Light Scent with Universal Appeal
Water Soluble
4.5 OZ/127.5 g.
No Animal Testing
Made in U.S.A.

name: Lucky-13 Swagger Cream Pomade
description:
Medium hold creamy rich hair dressing
Soft waxy consistency
Hair remains soft and plyable yet holds its style
Does not become stiff and you can easily recomb
Washes out easily with water and shampoo

Some people are born with it! Lucky-13 Swagger Cream Pomade is a medium hold creamy rich hair dressing that has a soft waxy consistency. Your hair remains soft and plyable yet holds its style. It stays moist in your hair so it does not become stiff and you can easily recomb your hair through the day. Washes out easily with water and shampoo. Rub product in hands and distribute evenly into hair. Style as desired. Works best on mostly dry/damp hair although you can add water for an even greater wet look and shine.

INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua, Eau), Parrafin, VP/VA Copolymer, Beeswax (Cera Alba, Cire d'abeille), Petrolatum, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Hydrogenated Cottenseed Oil, Cetyl Alcohol, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina, Cire microcrystalline), Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum, Huile minerale), Sorbitol, Hydroxylated Lanolin, Oleth-10, Oleth-5, Polyacrylamide (and) C13-14 Isoparaffin (and) Laureth-7, Fragrence (Parum), Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-6 Dioleate, Jojoba Esters, Polysorbate 20, Propylene Glycol, DMDM Hydantoin, Methylparab

name: Grant's Golden Brand Medium Blend Pomade
description:
A water soluble formula to give a natural light sheen and medium hold to all hair types, especially fine hair. It has a rich thick texture yet it's easy to apply and comb without the stiffness of gels. 

It has a pleasant royal Hawaiian almond scent. Water can be added as you comb or re-comb for gel like ease in styling and it will dry to a soft wax like consistency that remains combable for hours. $17.00


PRODUCT SIZE	4.5 oz

HOW TO USE	Rub a dime size amount into the palm of your hand and then spread starting at the back of your head first.

INGREDIENTS	Water, Ceteareth-25, Polyquatemium-11, Laureth-4, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, PEG-7 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (sweet Almond) Oil organic, FD&C Yellow 5, FD&C Yellow 6
